title: New champ Teaser!

embed.description: Wolf: Lamb, tell me a story! Lamb: There was once a pale man with dark hair who was very lonely. Wolf: Why was it lonely? Lamb: All things must meet this man. So, they shunned him. Wolf: Did he chase them all? Lamb: He took an axe and split himself in two.

body: What do you think? I think it sounds creepy... Maybe a mid laner?

replies.body:
I feel like it is going to be a top laner with the possibility of jungle. I really want it to be a mid laner though. GIVE ME A MAGE WITH AN AXE ALREADY. 

Could be a fighter.
